participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: caring and nurturing, with a passion for storytelling and creativity.
participant_1.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: free-spirited and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and connections with nature.
participant_2.background: i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i am an animal activist. my age is too old to say.
